title: Sun-blushed tomato and shallot spaghetti

default: handful each fresh chives, parsley, basil, chopped
1 lemon, cut into wedges, to garnish

steps: Heat the olive oil in a large frying pan, add the shallot and fry gently for two minutes. Add the garlic and cook for one minute. Add the tomatoes and wine and cook for four minutes, or until softened. Stir in the herbs, lemon juice and the cooked spaghetti.
Mix well to coat pasta and spoon into a serving bowl.
To serve, garnish with lemon wedges.
